info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A thunderstorm producing heavy rainfall will impact portions of northeastern Albany, southeastern Saratoga and central Rensselaer Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Sand Lake, or near East Greenbush, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...This storm is producing locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding especially of low lying and poor drainage areas are possible. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Albany, Troy, Clifton Park, East Greenbush, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Mechanicville, Nassau, Latham, Menands, Stephentown, Green Island, Waterford, Castleton-On-Hudson, Loudonville, West Sand Lake, Averill Park, Country Knolls and Center Brunswick. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 5. Interstate 87 between exits 4 and 7, and between exits 8A and 10. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
